mapper.insert: insert into home_special (creator, isDelete, classification_id, title, summary, lowest_price, cover, details_url, view_num, collect_num, reply_num, create_time, update_time) values (#{creator}, #{isDelete}, #{classificationId}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{lowestPrice}, #{cover}, #{detailsUrl}, #{viewNum}, #{collectNum}, #{replyNum}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
